title: Full Video: Charles III delivers first Christmas broadcast as king
description: Charles III delivered his first broadcasted Christmas message as king of the United Kingdom, thanking individuals and groups contributing their time to humanitarian efforts and remembering his mother Queen Elizabeth II, who had delivered the message over the last 70 years.

title: King Charles praises struggling workers amid cost-of-living crisis in his first Christmas address
description: King Charles III praised first responders and struggling families in his first Christmas greetings as the ruling monarch of the U.K. on Sunday.

title: Pope says the world was suffering from 'a famine of peace' in Christmas message
description: Pope Francis called for an end to the war in Ukraine and other conflicts in his Christmas message on Sunday.

title: Full video: Pope Francis holds Christmas Eve Midnight Mass from The Vatican
description: Pope Francis leads midnight mass on Christmas Eve from the Vatican in front of thousands of Catholics.

title: Ukrainian's 'know what we are fighting for,' Zelenksyy says in defiant Christmas message after Russian strikes
description: Ukrainian’s “know what we are fighting for,” President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said in a Christmas message, after officials said 10 people were killed in Kherson.

title: Over 50 hospitalized after Christmas Eve bus crash in British Columbia
description: Dozens of people were taken to hospital late Christmas Eve after a bus accident on a British Columbia highway, Canadian officials said.

title: 10 dead, 55 wounded as shells pummel Ukrainian city of Kherson, officials say
description: Russian shells pummeled Kherson on Saturday, killing at least 10 people and injuring 55 in the city that Moscow’s troops were forced to abandon last month.
